definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">graphic_setup_dimensions</field><next><block type="graphic_setup_dimensioneffects"><field name="reference">OVERWORLD</field><value name="effects"><block type="get_dimensionid"><field name="dimension">Surface</field></block></value><value name="fog"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></next></block><block type="controls_if" x="206" y="144"><value name="IF0"><block type="world_data_logic_getgamerule"><field name="gamerulesboolean">CUSTOM:PollutedAir</field></block></value></block><block type="graphic_set_fogdistance" x="75" y="236"><value name="start"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">100</field></block></value><value name="end"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">150</field></block></value><next><block type="graphic_set_fogcolor"><value name="color"><block type="graphic_get_rgbcolor"><value name="red"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">63</field></block></value><value name="green"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">69</field></block></value><value name="blue"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">81</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="graphic_set_fogshape"><field name="shape">FogShape.CYLINDER</field></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
